Html:
Hi contributor,
  Thanks very much for creating this fantastic library! I really enjoy the clear design of this project. 
I want to confirm whether the Graph# and QuickGraph dependent to Microsoft GLEE or MSAGL library or not.  Since both GLEE and MSAGL could be only used in non-commercial purpose. While we have one project that to use Sugiyama layout algorithm. Do Graph# implement the Sugiyama algorithm independent of GLEE library, or on top of it? Is there any limits for use Graph# in commercial application beside the agreement in License(http://graphsharp.codeplex.com/license)? 

 

Thanks!
Michael
